pack.simple_aether_cloud.mod.description: Simple Aether Cloud Mod Data Pack
block.simple_aether_cloud.yellow_cloud.d:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fCannot pass through block bottoms
block.simple_aether_cloud.blue_cloud.des:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fLaunches entities in the specified direction
§7Sneaking prevents launch and slowly sinks
block.simple_aether_cloud.horizontal_blu:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fLaunches entities in the specified direction
§7Sneaking prevents launch and slowly sinks
block.simple_aether_cloud.blue_cloud_ran:
Randomly launches entities in one of six directions
Hold Shift to pass through normally
block.simple_aether_cloud.red_cloud.desc:
§aPrevents fall damage
§cDeals damage to entities
§7Sneaking makes you immune to damage
block.simple_aether_cloud.green_cloud.de:
§aPrevents fall damage
§aAccelerates entity growth
§aSpeeds up breeding cooldown
§aAttracts nearby animals
§7Animals in the cloud will periodically attempt to breed
block.simple_aether_cloud.black_cloud.de:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fBlocks entities when activated by redstone
§fMobs always treat it as a solid block
block.simple_aether_cloud.black_cloud_to:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fToggles passability each time it's activated
§fMobs always treat it as a solid block
block.simple_aether_cloud.black_cloud_in:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fBlocks entities when not activated by redstone
§fMobs always treat it as a solid block
block.simple_aether_cloud.black_cloud_ti:
§aPrevents fall damage
§fBecomes passable when entities stand on it for a long time
§fMobs always treat it as a solid block
simple_aether_cloud.configuration.blue_c: Speed at which entities are launched upward
Number of particles generated by the blue cloud
simple_aether_cloud.configuration.horizo: Speed at which entities are launched horizontally
Number of particles generated by the horizontal blue cloud
simple_aether_cloud.configuration.random: Speed at which entities are launched in random directions
Number of particles generated by the random blue cloud
simple_aether_cloud.configuration.red_cl: Amount of damage dealt to entities each time
Number of particles generated by the red cloud
simple_aether_cloud.configuration.green_: Range at which the cloud attracts animals
Minimum distance animals need to maintain from the cloud
Speed at which animals are attracted to the cloud
Timer change multiplier (higher values make timers progress faster)
Number of particles generated by the green cloud
simple_aether_cloud.configuration.black_: Number of particles generated by the black cloud
